rendering_constraints.line_discipline: Build forms with clean pixel clusters; avoid stray single pixels (orphans).

perspective_rules.viewpoint: 2D side-on with shallow depth (classic adventure style).
perspective_rules.convergence: Mild convergence toward the background to create depth; avoid full isometric.
perspective_rules.walkable_area: Must be visually separated from non-walkable space via value (brightness) or texture contrast.

palette_and_shading.scene_palette_target_colors: 24-32 distinct colors per scene (including UI-safe accents).
palette_and_shading.material_shading_ramps: Maximum of 3 tones per material (base, shadow, highlight).
palette_and_shading.lighting_direction: Upper-left light source; soft shadows cast to lower-right.
palette_and_shading.dither_usage: Used sparingly. Permitted only for atmospheric haze/sky gradients or very worn asphalt. Do not dither solid objects.
palette_and_shading.gradient_policy: No smooth airbrush gradients; use solid bands.

pixel_art.outlines: Selective outlining only. Use dark edges on high-contrast boundaries to separate depth planes. Avoid full black outlines around every object.

texture_vocabulary.asphalt: Chunky speckle clusters + defined cracks. Create 2–3 cluster shapes and reuse them to establish a visual vocabulary.
texture_vocabulary.metal: Repeating vertical rhythm, minimal internal detail. Rely on strong silhouettes + 1 highlight ramp.
texture_vocabulary.vegetation: Leaf masses defined as 3–5 pixel clusters. Strictly avoid single-pixel 'noise grass'.
texture_vocabulary.micro_noise_policy: Zero tolerance for random single-pixel noise (shimmers in motion).

signage.text_style: Blocky, pixel-perfect text. Must be readable at 4× scale. Keep word count minimal.
signage.humor_rule: Subtle environmental storytelling (e.g. contradictory rules); never overt slapstick.

hotspots.visual_rule: Distinct silhouette required. Must have a 'value halo' (lighter background behind dark object, or vice-versa).
hotspots.placement_strategy: Keep hotspots clear of high-frequency background noise to ensure cursor readability.
